SELECT a.*, b.username, b.icon, c.details, c.`name`, c.posts_count, c.id postsId FROM posts a left join user b on a.user_id = b.id left join label c on a.label_id = c.id
and a.good = '1'
and a.top = '1'
and (a.content like concat('%',#{search},'%') or title like concat('%',#{search},'%'))
order by a.top desc,a.good desc,a.init_time desc

SELECT a.*, b.username, b.icon, c.details, c.`name`, c.posts_count, c.id postsId FROM posts a left join user b on a.user_id = b.id left join label c on a.label_id = c.id where a.label_id = #{labelId} order by a.init_time desc
SELECT a.*, b.username, b.icon FROM posts a LEFT JOIN USER b ON a.user_id = b.id where a.id = #{postsId}
